title: what can i do against hackers?
body: i just had a kalista in my game who was 29/0 and she killed everybody nothing could hit her she even said in all chat "u cant hit me im too sharp" she means that she uses leaguesharp a hack for lol...... i tried to report her but there is nothing no reason for hacking or anything... what can i do

replies.body:
Wenn du sicher bist, dass die Spieler Scripts benutzen, kannst du diese z.B. an den Support melden. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de/requests/new
Dass man dadurch nicht mehr angegriffen werden kann, ist mir aber neu.
Sorry my English is not sie yellow of sie egg I can't understand you
